pmhal_msgmgr.h File Reference

This file contains the MSGMGR interface declarations. More...

Macros

#define MSGMGR_GBL_CFG_REV_REG
 MSGMGR Global Config revision register address.
 
#define MSGMGR_GBL_CFG_REV   (0x4E641900U)
 MSGMGR Global Config revision register expected value.
 
#define MSGMGR_MESSAGE_MAX_BYTES   (64U)
 MSGMGR Maximum transferable data bytes.
 
#define MSGMGR_MESSAGE_MAX_WORDS   (MSGMGR_MESSAGE_MAX_BYTES/sizeof(uint32_t))
 MSGMGR Maximum transferable 32-bit data words.
 
#define MSGMGR_DATA_REGS_START   (16)
 MSGMGR first data register offset.
 
#define MSGMGR_DATA_REGS_END   (31)
 MSGMGR last data register offset. Also, used for MSGMGR push/pop operation.

Detailed Description

This file contains the MSGMGR interface declarations.

Function Documentation

pmErrCode_t PMHALMsgmgrInit ( void  )

Function to initialize the MSGMGR interface.

Parameters
None.
Returns
status PM_SUCCESS If init completes successfully PM_FAIL If init fails
pmErrCode_t PMHALMsgmgrPoll ( uint32_t  proxy,
uint32_t  queue,
uint32_t  timeout 
)

Function to poll a Message Manager proxy for a pending message.

Parameters
proxyProxy to poll for message
queueQueue within proxy to poll for message
timeoutPolling timeout
Returns
status PM_SUCCESS If message detected in proxy queue PM_FAIL If polling timed out
pmErrCode_t PMHALMsgmgrRead ( uint32_t  proxy,
uint32_t  queue,
uint32_t *  data,
uint32_t  size 
)

Function to read message from Message Manager proxy.

Parameters
proxyProxy to read
queueQueue within proxy to read
dataPointer to data array where read data will be stored
sizeSize of data array in bytes
Returns
status PM_SUCCESS If read completes successfuly PM_MSGMGR_INVALID_MSG_FORMAT If read fails
pmErrCode_t PMHALMsgmgrWrite ( uint32_t  proxy,
uint32_t  queue,
uint32_t *  data,
uint32_t  size 
)

Function to write message to Message Manager proxy.

Parameters
proxyProxy to write
queueQueue within proxy to write
dataPointer to data
sizeSize of data in bytes
Returns
status PM_SUCCESS If write completes successfuly PM_MSGMGR_INVALID_MSG_FORMAT If write fails
